item.title: Bitcoin Makes Finances Easier for Int'l Students in US Colleges
item.description:
Bitcoin Makes Finances Easier for Int'l Students in US Colleges

The rise of startups helping foreign students access the US credit market points to yet another revolutionary potential use for Bitcoin. Also read: Bitcoin Price Rally Rages on, Market Cap Passes $10 Bn USD International students, from developing nations in particular, who study in the US face huge difficulties obtaining credit - which is all too often vital for them to afford basic living costs.

item.title: Ethereum Price Technical Analysis - Final Target Achieved
item.description:
Ethereum Price Technical Analysis - Final Target Achieved

Ethereum price was boosted recently against the US Dollar, and the ETH bulls managed to gain control for a ride higher. Ethereum price was boosted recently against the US Dollar, and the ETH bulls managed to gain control for a ride higher.

item.title: NFL Star Darren McFadden: Accountant Blew $3 Million On Bitcoin Mining
item.description:
NFL Star Darren McFadden: Accountant Blew $3 Million On Bitcoin Mining

Many reading this would enjoy the opportunity to invest a solid $15 million into mining bitcoin, but an NFL star is alleging in civil court that his financial manager, Ameriprise Financial employee Michael Vick, did exactly that - with the star's money.

item.title: Bitcoin Price Technical Analysis for 06/13/2016 - How High Can It Go? - NEWSBTC
item.description:
Bitcoin Price Technical Analysis for 06/13/2016 - How High Can It Go? - NEWSBTC

Bitcoin price has shown strong upside momentum over the past few weeks and might be eyeing a test of these next ceilings. Bitcoin Price Key Highlights Bitcoin price has shown strong upside momentum over the past few weeks and might be eyeing a test of these next ceilings.

item.title: The Crypto Show: Andrew Wagner of HunterCoin and Atty. Jamie Balagia with Justin Arman on Asset Forfeiture
item.description:
The Crypto Show: Andrew Wagner of HunterCoin and Atty. Jamie Balagia with Justin Arman on Asset Forfeiture

We start off talking with Andrew Wagner of HunterCoin CoinFest and News BTC. We talk about his involvement in HunterCoin and how it works. Then we talk with Attorney Jamie Balagia and Justin Arman of Texans for Accountable Government about the new Civil Asset Forfeiture.

item.title: Cryptospace News Digest, June 5 - 12
item.description:
Cryptospace News Digest, June 5 - 12

Bitcoin heading to the Moon, raging bitcoin extortionists, good news from Russia and Ethereum expansion - all main events of the cryptoindustry in the week's overview. For the first time in two years, bitcoin price has surpassed the $600 mark. Last Saturday, bitcoin's market cap has reached $9 billion, and Sunday the exchange rate leaped to $590 from $576.

item.title: Does there exist a MOOC to learn about blockchain?
item.description:
Does there exist a MOOC to learn about blockchain?

There is rural, suburban and urban America. There is educated America and uneducated America. There is connected America and disconnected America. It's unfair to make a blanket statement about any group. But to label as dumb a group of people that have been at the forefront of innovative, out of the box thinking in technology, medicine, entertainment and general societ...

item.title: Bitcoin Price Surges to the $685 Mark, Ethereum Establishes a New All-Time-High
item.description:
Bitcoin Price Surges to the $685 Mark, Ethereum Establishes a New All-Time-High

The bull market continues its frenzy. Today Bitcoin reached a two-year high ($685 in Bitfinex), and the rally rippled waves across the Cryptocurrency market. Ethereum reached a new all-time high (in the ETHUSD FIAT pair).

item.title: It Begins: One European Bank Fails, Another One Needs An Urgent Cash Injection!
item.description:
It Begins: One European Bank Fails, Another One Needs An Urgent Cash Injection!

Interesting news this week as Belgium-based Optima Bank has been shut down by both the National Bank of Belgium (which also acts as the Belgian regulating body) as well as the ECB. According to the national supervisor, the bank would have been unable to meet its commitments to its clients and was forced to cease all banking activities after some potentially fraudulent transaction were unveiled.

item.title: Foreign Investors Dump Japan Stocks as Economic Planning Fails
item.description:
Foreign Investors Dump Japan Stocks as Economic Planning Fails

Foreign investors are on an exodus out of stocks in Japan as disillusionment with the country's economic policies sets in, according to a report. Also read: Japan Passes Law to Increase Regulation of Bitcoin Exchanges The latest news comes as Japanese fintech and bitcoin startups continue to post multimillion-dollar deals, providing a small but notable ray of hope.
